Params: {3: 'The power from the other end of the spider silk has grown too strong. Melinoe can no longer maintain the "dreams."'}
{3: 'In the pitch-black void, a sliver of daylight cracks open above you.'}
{3: "You hold your breath, and the next illusion isn't coming."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We can get out of here soon...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "When you wake up again, we'll see each other in the real world...", 4: '18'}
{3: "In an instant, a brilliant white light flares. Even through the shield of Liv's palm, you can feel its powerful radiance."}
{3: 'Your consciousness settles gently back into your body. Your sensory systems confirm it: everything has returned to reality.'}
{3: 'Your retinas adjust to the dimness. You are still inside the mine, in the same place where you last found Liv.'}
{3: 'Your last memory was a frantic scramble onto the stone platform, your hands gripping strange, crystalline minerals as you initiated a Deep M.I.N.D. connection with Liv...'}
{3: 'Suddenly, a faint rustling sound comes from the edge of the platform.'}
{3: 'The child with golden eyes stands there, watching.'}
{3: 'She knows with a cold certainty that Melinoe has failed.'}
{3: 'For the first time, the seemingly omnipotent nurturer could not bring back the "food" she wanted.'}
{3: 'She stares at the stone platform, utterly bewildered.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'On the stone platform, two figures are nestled closely together.'}

{1: '1', 3: "The silver-haired girl's eyes are tightly shut. Her weapon has dispersed, woven into a protective cocoon that firmly shields you, curled within, from the corruption of the surrounding minerals."}
{3: 'Love spins itself into a cocoon, holding you securely within. In her arms, she cradles her entire world.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Isn't love... supposed to be like what the nurturer does?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The nurturer would give her everything. Anything she wants. Anything she can get for her.'}
{1: '1', 3: '"Aisling" steps barefoot onto the stone platform. Bewildered, she reaches out to touch Liv...'}
{3: 'In that instant, the blades suddenly disperse, shattering the mineral cocoon around the two of you. The crystals crumble into sand, trickling down with a soft whisper.'}

{1: '1', 3: 'You struggle free from the shattered "cocoon." At the edge of the stone platform, the blue-haired girl stands poised, her hand reaching out to trace the crystalline minerals encasing Liv.'}
{3: 'You aim the dark gun barrel directly at "Aisling".'}
{3: "It's just a fake dream woven in the name of love, not a real family."}
{2: '???', 3: 'But 【kuroname】, I really love you. Stay with me...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "A bullet strikes the dirt before her feet, spraying soil over her toes. The child flinches, recoiling from the gun's dark muzzle."}
{3: 'She is only using Liv. Using Melinoe. Using you.'}
{3: 'The blue-haired child remains silent, her gaze falling. She looks wounded, but is this true sorrow, or just another carefully performed lie?'}
{3: 'A sharp crack pierces the air as the mineral fractures, and Liv begins to stir.'}
{3: '"Aisling" stumbles back a few steps, then whirls around, fleeing down a branching tunnel.'}
{3: 'She casts one last look toward the stone platform.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Liv is fully awake now, her weapon hovering protectively as she turns to speak to the human...'}
{3: "She can't stand against Liv. Not now."}
{3: 'She can feel it clearly. Spurred by some inevitable "catalyst," Liv\'s M.I.N.D. is steadily filling, growing denser and more powerful.'}
{3: 'This is a Liv who can counter illusions and stand against Melinoe; she is far beyond "Aisling\'s" current strength.'}
{3: "Why can't she penetrate that person's mind, even with all her power?"}
{3: 'And why... does she feel this irresistible pull to draw near?'}
{2: '"Aisling"', 3: 'I picked lots of wild fruits again today!'}
{2: '"Aisling"', 3: "Hmm, I've never seen a grassland before.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the dim mine tunnel, "Aisling" runs forward barefoot.'}
{3: 'The Gray Raven insignia is a cold, hard certainty clutched in her hand, a stark contrast to the countless questions and the hollow ache in her stomach.'}
{3: 'But she has all the time in the world. Someday... she will unravel every mystery.'}
{3: 'Like someone just waking from a nightmare, Liv frantically searches for any sign of you.'}
{3: "Liv spots the child's silhouette in the distance. In one fluid motion, she snaps into a combat stance, her weapon drawn and ready."}
{3: 'In the next moment, her body betrays her. A wave of dizziness sends her stumbling, and she falls into your steadying arms.'}
{2: 'Easy now. You only just woke up.', 3: '253'}
{2: "How's the state of your M.I.N.D. right now?", 3: '254'}
{3: "Even with a Deep M.I.N.D. connection, your capabilities are limited. You can stabilize the core of Liv's M.I.N.D., but the chaos clinging to its surface remains impervious to your reach."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's still chaotic on the surface... but with your connection, it's manageable. The real source of the problem has to be deeper in this mine...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The minerals might be part of it, but I have a feeling there's something else going on.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Swiftly, Liv retrieves a mineral sample from the stone platform and seals it in a container. But as she does, her brow furrows.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I think there's a research lab deep in the mine that used to study these minerals. Melinoe mentioned that she used to work there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I tried, but I can't get a signal through.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You pull up the rudimentary map from the Rodent squad. Your eyes are immediately drawn to the vast, uncharted sectors ahead, each boldly marked with a daunting question mark.'}
{3: 'While Rodent never ventured into the depths, their preliminary map should at least trace the initial path they took.'}
